Good Comments: Classical font that looks like it was brought out of the mid-2000s (Golden Age of Fansubbing).
Bad Comments: Retarded font that looks like it was brought out of the mid-2000s.

Good Comments: Weak translation. Especially in first episode. Other than that it's ok.
Bad Comments: first one writing a comment for ORZ so ill make it clear, their subs are awsome ! cant complain at all! ROCKSTEADY APPROVAL MARK! //Rajden

Good Comments: Had no issues with these subs.
Surprisingly solid group. Never heard of them before, but looked into it and they seem to know their shit and put out quality work.
Bad Comments: Cool karaoke, good translation, you can't go wrong with them. :)

Translation comes from CR, but it gets TLCd a bit. Karaoke is always nice and the video quality is great.
Great subs overall, I didn't notice any major problems other than them/him releasing a bit slow.

Good Comments: Quality subs with attention to details.
The best fan sub group with lyrics and everything.

The default subtitle track is rancid shit with name order reversal and terrible localization. The other track is not shit. No idea why they made the shit track the default, but switch to the non-shit track B before dropping this release.
Nice subs, nice font, translated OP and ED. Just make sure you use the secondary subtitle track so the names are used correctly instead of reversed order and that stuff.
Bad Comments: edited funi script + BS11 video source + translated songs
Lyrics are stylized to fit the anime, names as spoken, honorifics, and effects are added for greater impact

Good Comments: OP/ED is translated and has karaoke. Second track has honorifics and Japanese name ordering.
Bad Comments: It's just OCRed Funi's garbage scrip with additional mistranslations. Why this subs has that many positive votes? O.O And second track with honorifics? Why it's not default? Even no localized track has Yoko instead of Youko.
nice styling, good ts/kfx, its a funi edit but anything other than funi is a huge impovement

Good Comments: Beats the hell out of Funi hard sub rips.  Keep up the good work!
Much better than Funi (hard not to be), but you're still better off skipping the show than watching a release this bad.
>solid TL ...no, you mean solid editing. you probably know even less japanese than i do. they dont credit anyone as TL/TLC
Bad Comments: TV quality encodes so no Funimation eyecancer. Solid TL quality with better typesetting. Also the only group actively subbing SB69 this season.
Great Karaoke and a great series.  Glad someone picked it up!

Good Comments: shows over and they only put out 3 episodes. did you drop it? is it stalled? some updates would have been nice, going with hs for now
